items.summary: Fix the data-fetching logic in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` so that surgery cases are correctly fetched and returned for both the DashboardView and CasesListView components. Inspect the current implementation and identify why cases are not loading — likely a regression in query keys, actor calls, or result transformation introduced after Version 93 — and restore the correct fetching behavior.

Verify that `DashboardView.tsx` and `CasesListView.tsx` correctly consume the cases query result from `useQueries.ts` — ensuring they handle loading, error, and success states properly — and fix any component-level issues that may prevent cases from rendering even when the query returns data.
